Name: Leo
Text: *radio noise* Uh-oh. Commander, We seem to have lost radio contact with the ship.

Name: Christa
Text: Alright. No probs, you stay here and try to establish a connection, I'll go on ahead.

Name: Leo
Text: Thats against our SOP Commander, we have to go back or we'll end up in Intergalactic Penitentiary.

Name: Christa
Text: Haha. In case you forgot, you're talking to the legendary soldier of the Intergalactic Force!

Name: Leo
Text: *sigh* Looks like I can't stop the great Commander Christa Baron..

Name: Christa
Text: Shut up and follow my orders, I'll be back before you can say 'Peni-

Name: Christa
Text: Okay, maybe a bit longer than that.
